Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: As my classes are so big, teachers don't spend time in each student, so with AI I can have inmediate feedback so I can improve before sending my exams to the teachers

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: With AI I don’t feel judged and I will often take in count what it is suggesting me. With my teachers, sometimes I feel they don’t provide accurate feedback because we are too many studenta

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI is more personalized, but I always need to be careful and understand all the time and achers’ requirements first
